description.brief: The central mainland of PrimalMyst where Yggdrasil grows, serving as neutral ground where all six Eldritch God influences meet in balance.
description.detailed: Midgardland is the heart of the mortal world, a vast circular continent approximately 500 miles in diameter with Yggdrasil rising majestically from its exact center. This mainland serves as neutral territory where representatives of all six Eldritch God traditions can coexist and interact. The land is blessed with balanced eldritch divine influence - no single Eldritch God dominates, but all six can be felt and accessed. Six great coastal cities serve as gateways to their corresponding island realms, while the interior holds the world's most important diplomatic and spiritual centers. The presence of Yggdrasil makes this the most mystically active location in the mortal world, where mists from all six realms converge and create unique opportunities for those skilled in multiple eldritch divine traditions.
description.atmosphere: A sense of cosmic balance and limitless possibility, where every eldritch divine path remains open to those with dedication and wisdom

geography.terrain: Rolling hills and fertile plains radiating outward from Yggdrasil's base
geography.climate: Temperate and stable, with mystical weather patterns that reflect cosmic breathing patterns
geography.borders: Surrounded by the six straits leading to the Eldritch God island realms

key_locations.name: The Tree's Heart
key_locations.description: The base of Yggdrasil itself, the most sacred location in the world
key_locations.significance: Cosmic center where all Eldritch God forces converge
key_locations.access: Open to all who approach with respect and genuine spiritual seeking

key_locations.name: Pyrion's Gate
key_locations.description: Eastern coastal city facing the Fire Straits and Pyrion's Isle
key_locations.culture: Master smiths and fire mystics, known for incredible craftsmanship
key_locations.harbor: The Flame Harbor - ships with fire-blessed hulls and transformation forges

key_locations.name: Glacius' Gate
key_locations.description: Western coastal city facing the Frost Straits and Glacius' Isle
key_locations.culture: Scholar-preservers and ice mystics, maintaining vast libraries
key_locations.harbor: The Crystal Harbor - ships designed to preserve cargo perfectly during long voyages

key_locations.name: Voltharion's Gate
key_locations.description: Northern coastal city facing the Storm Straits and Voltharion's Isle
key_locations.culture: Message-keepers and lightning mystics, masters of communication
key_locations.harbor: The Spark Harbor - ships with lightning-powered systems and instant communication

key_locations.name: Serafina's Gate
key_locations.description: Southwestern coastal city facing the Shifting Straits and Serafina's Isle
key_locations.culture: Shadow mystics and forbidden knowledge seekers, masters of transformation
key_locations.harbor: The Twilight Harbor - ships cloaked in shadows that can navigate unseen

key_locations.name: Aurelius's Gate
key_locations.description: Southeastern coastal city facing the Radiant Straits and Aurelius's Isle
key_locations.culture: Healers and light mystics, providing sanctuary and eldritch divine wisdom
key_locations.harbor: The Radiant Harbor - ships blessed with protective light and healing capabilities

key_locations.name: Korthak's Gate
key_locations.description: Northwestern coastal city facing the Honor Straits and Korthak's Isle
key_locations.culture: Warriors and strength mystics, training grounds for champions of honor
key_locations.harbor: The Iron Harbor - ships built for strength and honor, capable of weathering any storm

key_locations.name: The Convergence Fields
key_locations.description: Central plains where mists from all six realms meet and blend
key_locations.significance: Unique mystical phenomena occur here, training ground for multi-path mystics
key_locations.location: Surrounding Yggdrasil's base in concentric rings

key_locations.name: The Neutral Halls
key_locations.description: Diplomatic centers where representatives from all Eldritch God traditions meet
key_locations.significance: Inter-realm politics, trade negotiations, and cultural exchange
key_locations.location: Positioned equidistant between the six gates

eldritch_divine_influence.balance_principle: All six Eldritch God influences are present but balanced, preventing any single force from dominating
eldritch_divine_influence.myrielle_presence: Strongest at transition points - harbors, convergence fields, and diplomatic centers
eldritch_divine_influence.mystical_opportunities: Unique to being the only place where all Eldritch God traditions can be studied simultaneously
eldritch_divine_influence.cosmic_significance: Serves as the fulcrum point that maintains balance between the six Eldritch God forces

cultural_aspects.population: Mixed communities representing all six Eldritch God traditions plus neutral scholars
cultural_aspects.governance: Council of Six - representatives from each Eldritch God tradition plus neutral mediators
cultural_aspects.economy: Based on inter-realm trade, mystical services, and diplomatic activities
cultural_aspects.education: The world's premier institutions for multi-path mystical study
cultural_aspects.festivals: Regular celebrations honoring the cosmic balance and inter-realm cooperation

story_requirements.description: Available from character creation - the starting region

eldritch_divine_requirements.description: No Eldritch God requirements - neutral ground accessible to all

special_requirements.description: Open to all who approach with respect

level_scaling.description: Heavily protected by Eldritch God balance - minimal threats in main areas

environmental_hazards.description: Occasional mystical surges near Yggdrasil require basic preparation

special_threats.name: Convergence Storms
special_threats.description: Rare events where all six Eldritch God influences clash, creating temporary dangerous zones

gameplay_significance.starting_location: Most player characters begin their journey here
gameplay_significance.hub_function: Central location for accessing all six Eldritch God paths and island realms
gameplay_significance.neutral_ground: Safe space for players aligned with different Eldritch God traditions to interact
gameplay_significance.advanced_training: Late-game location for mastering multiple Eldritch God influences simultaneously
gameplay_significance.endgame_content: Critical location for cosmic events and multi-realm challenges

transportation.to_islands: Regular ships depart from each gate city to its corresponding island realm
transportation.travel_time: 2-3 days by normal ship, faster with Eldritch God blessing or mystical enhancement
transportation.mystical_routes: Advanced mystics can travel instantly via Yggdrasil's branch network
transportation.myrielle_guidance: The Hidden One provides special transport during reality instance transitions
